SEARCH
Package dataAccess

Class UserDAO

java.lang.Object
dataAccess.UserDAO
public class UserDAO extends Object
The class provides methods to access and manipulate User objects in the data store.

    • getUserByUsername

      public User getUserByUsername(String username) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Returns the user with the associated username
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the associated user
      Returns:
      The user with the associated username
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - When there is no user with the associated username

    • getUserByEmail

      public User getUserByEmail(String email) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Return the user with the associated email
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the associated user
      Returns:
      The user with the associated email
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - When there is no user with the associated email

    • updateUser

      public void updateUser(User user, String username, String password, String email) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Updates information about a user
      Parameters:
      user - The user that needs to be updated
      username - The new username for the user
      password - The new password for the user
      email - The new email for the user
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - When the given user doesn't exist

    • addUser

      public void addUser(User user) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Adds a user to the data store
      Parameters:
      user - The user to be added to the data store
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - When the user already exists in the data store

    • removeUser

      public void removeUser(User user) throws dataAccess.DataAccessException
      Removes a user from the data store
      Parameters:
      user - The user to be removed
      Throws:
      dataAccess.DataAccessException - When the user doesn't exist in the data store

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears all the Users in the database.

    • findUser

      public boolean findUser(User user)
      Finds a user in the data store
      Parameters:
      user - The user that we are looking for in the data store
      Returns:
      true if the user is found, otherwise return false
